name: Slime Slayer
description:
Grab your sword and become the Slime Slayer! Rampage through a 3D world inspired by old school 8-Bit games.

Slime Slayer is a FPS, procedurally generated, rougelike dungeon crawler in Pixel Prime 8-Bit 3D.

Sing along with the trailer song:
Slime Slayer. Slime Sla-a-a-a-yer!
First you find the sword,
Then you slay the slime,
Then you slay more slime!
When you slay - the last slime,
Find the exit - before you're out of time!
Or you're finished.
Slime Sla-a-a-a-yer!!!
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
